executable.title: vtkFilter
executable.description: This module is used to extract fibers of interest from a larger .vtk fiber file. Specify one or more LabelFiles in the Input area and use them in a logic expression to filter out the fibers you need. To find regions passing through a Region simply use the capital letter corresponding to it (e.g. A), to find fibers ending in the region use a lower case 'e' at the end of the region (e.g. Ae). To find fibers not ending or passing through the region use 'not Ae' or 'not A', respectively. An example of a valid expression is: 'Ae and (B or (not C and not D))'
